mcq.statement: Choose the grammatically correct sentence: The air quality in Karachi is becoming more worst than it was a decade ago, The air quality in Karachi is becoming more worse than it was a decade ago, The air quality in Karachi is becoming worse than it was a decade ago, The air quality in Karachi is becoming worst than it was a decade ago

options.a: The air quality in Karachi is becoming more worst than it was a decade ago
options.b: The air quality in Karachi is becoming more worse than it was a decade ago
options.c: The air quality in Karachi is becoming worse than it was a decade ago
